chat.text: How do I implement a binary search in Python?
Can you explain the time complexity in more detail?

The time complexity is O(log n) because with each iteration, we cut the search space in half. If we start with n elements, after one comparison we have n/2 elements to search, then n/4, then n/8, and so on. The number of times we can divide n by 2 until we reach 1 is logâ‚‚(n), which is why the complexity is O(log n).
